<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The target location for the relocation is described by RE.SectionID and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RE.Offset.  RE.SectionID can be used to find the SectionEntry.  Each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SectionEntry has three members describing its location.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SectionEntry::Address is the address at which the section has been loaded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into memory in the current (host) process.  SectionEntry::LoadAddress is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the address that the section will have in the target process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SectionEntry::ObjAddress is the address of the bits for this section in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original emitted object image (also in the current address space).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Relocations will be applied as if the section were loaded at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SectionEntry::LoadAddress, but they will be applied at an address based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on SectionEntry::Address.  SectionEntry::ObjAddress will be used to refer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to Target memory contents if they are required for value calculations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Value parameter here is the load address of the symbol for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relocation to be applied.  For relocations which refer to symbols in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current object Value will be the LoadAddress of the section in which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the symbol resides (RE.Addend provides additional information about the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbol location).  For external symbols, Value will be the address of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbol in the target address space.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delta is the distance from the start of the reloc to the end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction with the reloc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t Delta = 4 + (RE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/relocationentry/#a4b339d832145cb7ea79bbb90f5233897">RelType</a> - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#a7d8b48e10ac507c952d8d53a1ed68125a1376dddaf4ade08fe5429571a06c6249">COFF::IMAGE&#95;REL&#95;AMD64&#95;REL32</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> -= FinalAddress + Delta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t Result = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> + RE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/relocationentry/#a80213c5b59afecdd125a21b28b9637e9">Addend</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((int64&#95;t)Result &lt;= INT32&#95;MAX) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Relocation overflow&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((int64&#95;t)Result &gt;= INT32&#95;MIN) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Relocation underflow&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyldimpl/#ac7b095afaba91cf9bf59313c8e94d2d9">writeBytesUnaligned</a>(Result, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>, 4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#a7d8b48e10ac507c952d8d53a1ed68125a69bb08ed3be752cf59e3f3c920551467">COFF::IMAGE&#95;REL&#95;AMD64&#95;ADDR32NB</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ADDR32NB requires an offset less than 2GB from &#39;ImageBase&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The MemoryManager can make sure this is always true by forcing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memory layout to be: CodeSection &lt; ReadOnlySection &lt; ReadWriteSection.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t ImageBase = getImageBase();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt; ImageBase || ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> - ImageBase) &gt; UINT32&#95;MAX))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;IMAGE&#95;REL&#95;AMD64&#95;ADDR32NB relocation requires an &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ordered section layout&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">        write32BitOffset(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>, RE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/relocationentry/#a80213c5b59afecdd125a21b28b9637e9">Addend</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> - ImageBase);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
